roles-description.manager: Full access to tasks, projects, screenshot and all users' activity
roles-description.auditor: Read access to projects, create and read access to all the tasks, access to all users activity
roles-description.user: Read access to assigned projects, create and view tasks, view personal activity

project-roles-description.auditor: Read access to assigned projects, create and view all the assigned project's tasks, view all the project users' activity
project-roles-description.manager: Full access to assigned projects, full access to project's tasks, view all the project users' activity
project-roles-description.user: Read access to assigned projects, view all the assigned project's tasks, view personal activity
